1.title: De gletsjer van Ilulissat, Groenland
1.plot: Bartel's journey starts in Greenland. Greenland is known by scientists as the barometer of the earth, the canary in the mine. Every change in climate is first noticed here and is later established all over the world.

2.title: Grand Canyon, Arizona, USA
2.plot: Everyone should see Arizona's leading lady with their own eyes for at least once in their life, that's for sure. The Mother of all natural wonders, as he describes it, stands high on Bartel's list of natural wonders.

3.title: Overwinteringsplaats van de Monarchvlinder, Michoacán, Mexico
3.plot: Sometimes beauty lies in small things. Literally. The butterfly reservation of Michoacán, located in the forested mountains about 100km northwest of Mexico City, protects the most important hibernation place of the Monarch butterflies.

4.title: Amazone, Brazilië
4.plot: A journey through the most impenetrable forest in the world is tree surgeon Bartel's cup of tea. The Jungle, exotic animals and homemade exotic cocktails: Amazon Adventure.

5.title: Serengeti National Park, Tanzania
5.plot: Each year, millions of wildebeest, gazelles and zebras travel through the Serengeti. They are followed by troops of lions, cheetahs and hyenas. The biggest move in the animal kingdom is called: The Big Migration. And Bartel wants to see it.

6.title: Kamchatka, Rusland
6.plot: "Give me woods, give me snow and give me a volcano", Bartel said. That's what Kamchatka delivered.

7.title: Great Barrier Reef, Australië
7.plot: The seventh and final miracle Bartel wants to see is the most spectacular underwater scene on earth.

8.title: De thuiskomst en de kater
8.plot: After a journey of 100 days, Bartel returns home. It's time for him to endorse his findings scientifically.

imdb.plot outline: In Bartels Beard, a young tree surgeon embarks on an epic 100-day journey to visit seven of the world's most extraordinary natural wonders. The one thing he doesn't pack is his razor. From the serenity of myriads of butterflies in Mexico to the roar of the erupting Kamchatka volcanoes. From the freezing glaciers of Greenland to the scorching plains of Tanzania. Bartels Beard takes us to seven far flung corners of the world where nature can't help but put a show. But is the date of the very final performance closer than we think? He brings back the verdict. And a 100-day beard.
imdb.title: De Baard van Bartel
plot: Could you imagine a world without the Grand Canyon, The Great Barrier Reef or the Amazon? For the planet, some places are indispensable - it's quite simply a matter of life and death.

In Bartels Beard, a young tree surgeon embarks on an epic 100-day journey to visit seven of the world's most extraordinary natural wonders. The one thing he doesn't pack is his razor. From the serenity of myriads of butterflies in Mexico to the roar of the erupting Kamchatka volcanoes. From the freezing glaciers of Greenland to the scorching plains of Tanzania. Bartels Beard takes us to seven far flung corners of the world where nature can't help but put a show. But is the date of the very final performance closer than we think? He brings back the verdict. And a 100-day beard.
